title: The Wise Ass
description: A mafia lawyer, spirited away to rural Northern Colorado by the federal Witness Protection Program (WITSEC), befriends a whole new crew of mystical humans, animals and others, including a loquacious mule, who help him atone for the sins of his past. But scores need to be settled, so when the betrayed Wise Guys finally meet the Wise Ass and friends, all hell breaks loose.
author: Tom McCaffrey
